## Source: ossf-package-analysis (2311551fa4a1c2bad3f85011bc749098ffde0bc5b5be4987895c53921bdf2b53)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'largebatchctr' @ 94.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
